chat.rc_signal.survey_restart: Starts a new survey session (previous session abandoned)
chat.rc_signal.survey_invalid.previous_u: Invalid survey session: previous signal is not bound to any rail
chat.rc_signal.survey_invalid.current_un: Invalid survey session: current signal is not bound to any rail
chat.rc_signal.survey_invalid.invalid_si: Invalid signal block (interval): unable to find straight rail path
chat.rc_signal.tuning_restart: Starts a new tuning session (previous session abandoned)
chat.rc_signal.tuning_invalid.original_l: Invalid tuning session: original signal emitter does not exist
chat.rc_signal.tuning_invalid.wrong_orde: Invalid tuning session: wrong tuning order
tooltip.rc_signal.signal_surveyor.line1: Used as a binding tool to bind two block signals together.
tooltip.rc_signal.signal_tuner.line1: Used as binding tool to bind a signal emitter to a signal receiver.
tooltip.rc_signal.single_head_signal.lin: Signal that emits status of belonging signal block (interval).
Block signal will search the nearest rail block up to 2 blocks horizontally,
range from 1 block higher to 4 blocks lower vertically and automatically bind rail block to the signal.
Block signal will emit signal based on corresponding status:
tooltip.rc_signal.single_head_signal.bli: Not bound to other block signals.
tooltip.rc_signal.single_head_signal.red: Bound, there's at least 1 minecart either stopping in the signal block (interval) or approaching this block signal.
tooltip.rc_signal.single_head_signal.bli: Block signal is in either tuning or survey session.
tooltip.rc_signal.single_head_signal.yel: Bound, there's at least 1 minecart in the signal block (interval) and moving away from this block signal.
tooltip.rc_signal.single_head_signal.gre: Bound, the signal block (interval) is clear.
tooltip.rc_signal.distant_single_head_si: Signal that shows bound block signal's signal.
tooltip.rc_signal.signal_box_receiver.li: Signal box that emits redstone power.
